hero.headline: Farm-to-Table California Cuisine
hero.subheadline: Seasonal ingredients, local farms, unforgettable flavors. Experience the best of California on every plate.

items.text: The tasting menu was a journey. Every course was thoughtful and delicious. A must-visit.

items.name: James K.
items.text: Best farm-to-table experience in the city. You can taste the freshness in every bite.

sections.title: The Golden Fork Story
sections.content: Founded in 2018 by Chef Maria Santos, The Golden Fork celebrates the incredible bounty of California. Our relationships with local farmers and producers allow us to serve the freshest seasonal ingredients, prepared with technique and creativity.

team.name: Maria Santos
team.bio: Trained at The French Laundry, committed to sustainable cuisine

hero.headline: Visit Us
hero.subheadline: We look forward to serving you
